As I said at the time, it was shameful to give Trump a huge Pentagon budget without putting real limits on his abuse of power.
 
Now he's unconstitutionally diverting $7 billion to build his border wall.

When will Congress finally have the guts to rein in this lawless president? https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1216973248539299840 QT @nytimes President Trump plans to divert an additional $7.2 billion in military funding for the construction of a wall on the southern border. The amount far exceeds what Congress allocated for border barriers this year. https://trib.al/JCDy5MD

The future of our economy and a generation of student loan borrowers are at risk, and we must use every tool and opportunity we have to help them. We can't let corruption in Washington hold back big, structural change. I’m committed to seeing this fight through—no matter what.

I made sure Congress provided $700 million in a relief fund for borrowers who dedicated their lives to public service but missed technical requirements for loan forgiveness, and I fought to cancel loans for 80,000 students who were cheated by Corinthian Colleges.

The real danger that we face as Democrats is picking a candidate who can’t pull our party together—or someone who takes big parts of the democratic constituency for granted. We need a candidate who will excite all parts of our party and bring everyone in. #DemDebate

Our trade policies should lift up workers and grow the economy, but must also protect our environment and our future. By not confronting climate change, the USMCA fails to meet the crises of the moment.

We can do better, and that's why today I voted NO on the USMCA in committee.

This is the richest country on Earth.

There is no reason why we should not have the best public educational system in the world.

Together with @cceanv we are going to make that a reality. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EOQJMhVX4AEpKZf.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1217101873787949056/vid/480x270/OUby7C8QGs08luTn.mp4?tag=13

This is just the beginning of our climate crisis.
